Powerful Medieval Era mercenary unit that may pillage improvements at no additional movement point cost and specializes in defeating mounted units and plundering cities. May move immediately after purchase.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires the Mercenary Army Social Policy and can only be purchased with [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

The Landsknecht is the only available mercenary unit. The Landsknecht receives a +50% Combat Bonus against mounted units and earns [ICON_GOLD] Gold from attacking cities equal to the damage dealt. The Landsknecht may pillage improvements at no additional [ICON_MOVES] Movement point cost and can move immediately after being purchased. Unlike other military units, the Landsknecht cannot be built and must instead be purchased with [ICON_GOLD] Gold after adopting the Mercenary Army Social Policy.
